item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

try replacing:

deleteItem(7582, getItemSlot(592), 1);

with this:

deleteItem(7582, getItemSlot(7582), 1);

item.title: Need help with door// sort of key
item.dc:creator: @BlackBeast666 BlackBeast666
item.description:
@BlackBeast666 wrote:

case 1530:
if(objectX == 3206 && objectY == 3385) {
if(playerHasItemAmount(7582, 1)==false)
{
sendMessage("You need a "+getItemName(7582));
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(7582, 1)==true)
{ deleteItem(7582, getItemSlot(592), 1);
sendMessage(“You succesfully burn your cat.”);
teleportToX = 3205;
teleportToY = 3388;
sendMessage(“Welcome to BlackBeast’s Hideout!”);
}

I tought i made it that you could enter the room (teleported in it) when you have item 7582 (a hellcat) in yoru inventory.
But now it just teleport you in the room, with or without having a hellcat.

help plz.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2007, 09:31:25 AM[/size][hr]some1?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2007, 10:12:15 AM[/size][hr]C’mon any1? what did i do wrong?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2007, 11:55:29 AM[/size][hr]PLZ someone help me!!
